per_frame_1=chng=sin(time*.5);
per_frame_2=cthr=.9999;
per_frame_3=mq21=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq21);
per_frame_4=mq22=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq22);
per_frame_5=mq23=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(3),mq23);
per_frame_6=mq24=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq24);
per_frame_7=mq25=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq25);
per_frame_8=mq26=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(2),mq26);
per_frame_9=mq27=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1),mq27);
per_frame_10=mq28=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1),mq28);
per_frame_11=mq29=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1)*.3,mq29);
per_frame_12=mq31=if(above(chng,cthr),rand(1)*.3,mq31);
per_frame_13=monitor=chng;
per_frame_14=q21=mq21;q22=mq22;q23=mq23;q24=mq24;q25=mq25;q26=mq26;
per_frame_15=q27=mq27;q28=mq28;q29=mq29;q31=mq31;
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=monitor=mq1;
per_frame_18=vol=bass+treb+mid;
per_frame_19=atime=atime+vol;
per_frame_20=q11=.4+sin(atime*.006        )*.4;
per_frame_21=q12=.4+cos(atime*.00613828348)*.4;
per_frame_22=q13=.4+sin(atime*.00598593455)*.4;
per_frame_23=monitor=q13;
per_frame_24=dec=pow(.98,60/fps);
per_frame_25=num0=numbeat*(abs(num-num_att)+pump)+bnot(numbeat)*num0;
per_frame_26=pump=numbeat*(sin(t)*.1+.1)+bnot(numbeat)*pump;
per_frame_27=pump=pump*dec;
per_frame_28=
per_frame_29=num_b0=num_b;
per_frame_30=num=abs((bass-bass_att)+(mid-mid_att)+(treb-treb_att));
per_frame_31=num_att=num_att*.95+num*.05;
per_frame_32=num_b=above(num,1-pump)*above(abs(num-num_att),num0);
per_frame_33=numbeat=bnot(equal(num_b0,num_b));
per_frame_34=
per_frame_35=t=t+num*.1;
per_frame_36=bc=bc+numbeat;
per_frame_37=bass_flow=bass_flow+3*abs(bass-bass_att)/fps;
per_frame_38=treb_flow=treb_flow+3*abs(treb-treb_att)/fps;
per_frame_39=mid_flow=mid_flow+3*abs(mid-mid_att)/fps;
per_frame_40=
per_frame_41=wave_r=.5+.5*sin(t*1.1+bc*2)+sin(bass_flow)*.25*(frame%2);
per_frame_42=wave_g=.5+.5*sin(t*0.8+bc*3.14)+sin(treb_flow)*.25*(frame%2);
per_frame_43=wave_b=.5+.5*sin(t*1.3)+sin(mid_flow)*.25*(frame%2);
per_frame_44=wave_mystery=frame%2;
per_frame_45=
per_frame_46=q1=t;
per_frame_47=q2=bc;
per_frame_48=q3=2+4*sin(t*0.33+time*1.42+bc*0.1);
per_frame_49=q4=2+3*cos(t*0.15+time*1.41+bc*0.2);
per_pixel_1=rot=sin(rad*3.14+time)*sin(q1)*.3;
per_pixel_2=zoom=zoom-0.1*rad;
per_pixel_3=cx=cx+.1*sin(x*2*q4+time);
per_pixel_4=cy=cy+.1*sin(y*2*q3+time);
per_pixel_5=sx=sx-sin(y*3.14*q3+q1*0.37)*.1;
per_pixel_6=sy=sy-sin(x*3.14*q4+q1*0.82)*.1;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
warp_6=`                      ((uv.xyy*q27
warp_7=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
warp_8=`                      ).xyz*
warp_9=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
warp_10=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q29
warp_11=`                     );
warp_12=`if(ret.x> q21*q13         && ret.x<= q24*q11        )ret.y += (noise9).x*.5; 
warp_13=`if(ret.y> q22*q11         && ret.y<= q25*q12        )ret.z += (noise9).y*.5; 
warp_14=`if(ret.z> q23*q12         && ret.z<= q26*q13        )ret.x += (noise9).z*.5; 
warp_15=`    ret=max(ret,tex2D(sampler_fc_main,lerp(uv_orig,uv,0.5))*.97); //trails
warp_16=`
warp_17=`    //add water effect
warp_18=`    ret+=(ret-GetBlur1(uv))*0.15;
warp_19=`    
warp_20=`    // darken (decay) over time
warp_21=`    ret *= 0.97; //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_22=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    float2 echo=(uv-0.5)*0.5*float2(-1,-1)+0.5;
comp_4=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_5=`    ret=lerp(ret,GetPixel(echo),0.3);
comp_6=`
comp_7=`    //darken
comp_8=`    ret=1-ret;
comp_9=`    ret*=lum(ret);
comp_10=`    
comp_11=`    //blood-palletized
comp_12=`    ret=pow(ret,float3(0.2,1.2,0.8));
comp_13=`    ret=lerp(ret,float3(1,0,0),lum(ret));
comp_14=`    ret*=1.33;
comp_15=`
comp_16=`    //add some precise edges here...
comp_17=`    ret-=(0.5-abs(ret.x-0.5))*2;
comp_18=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
comp_19=`                      ((echo.xyy*q28
comp_20=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
comp_21=`                      ).xyz*
comp_22=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
comp_23=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q31
comp_24=`                     );
comp_25=`if(ret.x> q26*q13         && ret.x<= q23*q11        )ret.z -= (noise9).x*.5; 
comp_26=`if(ret.y> q25*q11         && ret.y<= q22*q12        )ret.x -= (noise9).y*.5; 
comp_27=`if(ret.z> q24*q12         && ret.z<= q21*q13        )ret.y -= (noise9).z*.5; 
comp_28=`}
